cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8218, a bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 619 Hewett Street in Neillsville, Wisconsin, as the “Corporal Mitchell Red Cloud, Jr. Post Office

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 107 (Thursday, June 23, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TIFFANY:
H.R. 8218.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 Clause 7: The Congress shall have Power
to establish Post Offices and post Roads;
[Page H5879]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 619 Hewett Street in Neillsville, Wisconsin, as the "Corporal Mitchell Red Cloud, Jr. Post Office".
